channel.title: Comments on: Numb and dumb
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: "And I'm old enough to take care of ourself. I don't need to make someone help me. It's the worst thing to do when you are me."Oh. But you can ask for help, that's different than making someone help you. And they can say no, that's true, but they may also say yes.K
item.content:encoded: “And I’m old enough to take care of ourself. I don’t need to make someone help me. It’s the worst thing to do when you are me.”Oh. But you can ask for help, that’s different than making someone help you. And they can say no, that’s true, but they may also say yes.K
